speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mike from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm doing well, thank you. How can I help you?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm calling about your outstanding debt with First National Bank. Before we proceed, can you verify your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thanks. Now, can you also confirm your current address?

speaker: Agent
text: Alright, you've got a balance of $3,000. How the hell do you plan to settle that?

speaker: Customer
text: I prefer to discuss payment options calmly.

speaker: Agent
text: Calmly? You think I'm in the mood for that shit? You owe money! Just pay up!

speaker: Customer
text: I understand, but I need to understand my options first.

speaker: Agent
text: Options? You either pay now or I’ll make your life hell with calls! What’s so hard to get?

speaker: Customer
text: I can assure you that I will make a payment, just not immediately.

speaker: Agent
text: Whatever, but don't think you can just ignore this. It’s going to bite you in the ass!

speaker: Customer
text: I will address it as soon as possible. Thank you.

speaker: Agent
text: Yeah, good luck with that. Bye!
